text: Richard Norman Hastings (born February 7, 1941) is an American Republican politician. He was the U.S. representative for from 1995 until his retirement in 2015. In February 2014, Hastings announced that he would not run for re- election in 2014. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Washington Category:Politicians from Spokane, Washington Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Doc Hastings
